"Eco-friendly frame": Create a picture frame made entirely of recycled materials, such as old CDs, scraps of paper, or plastic bottles. This would appeal to environmentally conscious consumers who want to reduce their carbon footprint. Confidence score: 0.8

"Interactive frame": Design a picture frame that allows users to interact with the photo by using a touch screen or a smartphone app. For example, the frame could have a touch screen that displays additional information about the photo or allows users to adjust the brightness and contrast of the photo. Confidence score: 0.7

"Customizable frame": Create a picture frame that allows users to customize the frame with their own artwork, designs, or text. This would appeal to people who want to personalize their frames and make them unique. Confidence score: 0.6

"Smart mirror frame": Design a picture frame that doubles as a smart mirror, allowing users to see their reflection and check the weather, news, or other information. This would be a convenient addition to any room and could help people stay connected to the world even when they're not using their smartphone. Confidence score: 0.7

"3D printed frame": Create a picture frame using 3D printing technology, allowing users to choose from a variety of unique and intricate designs. This would appeal to people who want a one-of-a-kind frame that stands out from the rest. Confidence score: 0.6
